entry.title: bad guy
entry.summary:
Author: mikaminato

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,236Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: The problem with chasing someone, though, is that you never really catch up. And if you're chasing the Red Hood, well. You might as well hang a sign around your neck that says shoot here, free of charge.Some spoken rules between them have already been established.Some of them include: no talking about it, no staying the night, no cuddling, no prying about the other's day-to-day, no touching outside of fucking, no feelings, and most importantly, no telling anyone, including any of the Bats and especially Bruce.They've been doing a good job at sticking to their little rule book so far. (Or, the usual "no strings attached" turned into "I love him so much I cannot breathe".)

entry.title: The Strange and Harrowing Case of The Bludhaven Monster
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,125Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 13

Summary: In the fog-shrouded city of Gotham, where monsters stalk the streets as divine punishment and warring faiths divide the people, seventeen-year-old Jason Todd burns with righteous fury against all creatures of darkness. Trained by the legendary hunter Bruce Wayne and haunted by childhood memories of abandonment and betrayal, Jason is sent alone to the isolated island of Bludhaven for his first solo hunt—a rite of passage that will determine whether he becomes a true member of the Guild of Justice.

entry.title: Blind Faith
entry.summary:
Author: AxisMage

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 89,244Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 105

Summary: It's no one's fault but his own that Dick is sitting there now, cold and utterly miserable, and very close to freezing to death.It's no one's fault but his own that he let his heart and mind get away again. It's no one's fault but his own that he wanted for someone who couldn't and wouldn't be his, and Wally is right.Dick needs to get back to his life, start over and make new friends. That's all, nothing more and nothing less. Friends, Dick needs friends, and sadly (according to Wally), Krypto isn't enough.

entry.title: Transference
entry.summary:
Author: murphy_stoffelis

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,159Chapters: 2/16Kudos: 24

Summary: A violent blight is sweeping through Gotham. Innocent people are suddenly being consumed by rage— with disastrous consequences. With no cure in sight, Jason finds himself working with Batman to save the city from madness.Even with his resurrection a thing of the past, an alliance with the Bats is a harrowing line between reconnecting with a former life and preserving the Red Hood's hard-won autonomy— especially when Jason's partnership with Dick Grayson begins to rekindle a past they've both tried to bury.Because in a city like Gotham, you can't trust who you love. Not even family.

entry.title: Bad men die
entry.summary:
Author: authorettejasmin

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,341Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 547

Summary: I do not sleep; a symbol burns out in the sky and my body tingles, sweats cold and aches bone-deep. The arms around me squeeze tighter and I feel him shake behind me.The one who calls me brother.The one who calls me Jason.He loves me, protects me and even though I don't remember who I am or how I got here, I know one thing.A bad man is trying to hurt him.And bad men should die. Jason digs his way out and Talia may find him first, but she isn't the one who keeps him.

entry.title: In The Darkest Of Times
entry.summary:
Author: AnonDude

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,531Chapters: 19/19Kudos: 38

Summary: On the way back to the police station after his lunch break, Dick stops to help a civilian. Which turns out to be the absolute worst mistake of his life and the beginning of the week from the deepest, darkest depths of hell.Dick has been through a lot in his life, a lot of terrible things, but somehow he always managed to make it through — somehow he always stubbornly clung on to hope and forged his way forward through life.He's not sure he's that person anymore.When Jason finally finds him and brings him home, it turns out the road to recovery is a long, tiring, and very rocky one. But it also turns out Dick maybe has a lot more help than he thought. And just possibly romance isn't completely out of the cards as much as he'd originally assumed.

entry.title: If It's Real
entry.summary:
Author: SuddenlySullen

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,863Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 98

Summary: “I'm sending the information to Red Robin,” Oracle talks over him. “In the meantime, you need to keep him warm.”“How do you propose I do that?” Jason asks as he's kicking the door shut and bolting it behind them.“Do what? At least I got a buzz,” Dick says dreamily. The familiar fuzz is settling into his stomach, almost like he's actually high, not just a little buzzed on alcohol.“Figure it out unless you'd rather I send B-Man over there,” Oracle snaps. “Don't let him be next,” she adds, softer.

entry.title: You Are Out of My League
entry.summary:
Author: ivebeenbamboozled (brainwitchletty)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 429,304Chapters: 41/?Kudos: 1,108

Summary: The story begins with a new Robin to replace the old, with Nightwing none the wiser to being replaced at all, and suddenly he has a little brother within the same terrible day. It takes a while to accept, but Dick quickly learns this new Robin-- Jason Todd-- is exactly what Dick Grayson was always missing in his life, and in many more ways than one. Through the years with the team and working with the Justice League, Jason finds a place for himself and becomes a vital member of the Young Justice League while also becoming a vital centerpiece in Dick's life. And when all that ends-- when Jason Todd is taken away from Dick-- it's going to be even harder to put his life back together with that emptiness returning once more.. . .Mostly canon compliant story detailing Jason's introduction to the Young Justice League as Robin, his eventual death, and Dick discovering the mysterious red-hooded figure acting as Ra's Al Ghul's bodyguard is a lot more familiar than he should be.
